speaker: BEDFORD
text:
The
               
              day
               
              begins
               
              to
               
              break
               
              and
               
              night
               
              is
               
              fled
              ,

speaker: BEDFORD
text:
Whose
               
              pitchy
               
              mantle
               
              over-veiled
               
              the
               
              Earth
              .

speaker: BEDFORD
text:
Here
               
              sound
               
              retreat
               
              and
               
              cease
               
              our
               
              hot
               
              pursuit
              .

speaker: TALBOT
text:
Bring
               
              forth
               
              the
               
              body
               
              of
               
              old
               
              Salisbury
              ,

speaker: TALBOT
text:
And
               
              here
               
              advance
               
              it
               
              in
               
              the
               
              marketplace
              ,

speaker: TALBOT
text:
The
               
              middle
               
              center
               
              of
               
              this
               
              cursèd
               
              town
              .

speaker: TALBOT
text:
Now
               
              have
               
              I
               
              paid
               
              my
               
              vow
               
              unto
               
              his
               
              soul
              :

speaker: TALBOT
text:
For
               
              every
               
              drop
               
              of
               
              blood
               
              was
               
              drawn
               
              from
               
              him

speaker: TALBOT
text:
There
               
              hath
               
              at
               
              least
               
              five
               
              Frenchmen
               
              died
               
              tonight
              .

speaker: TALBOT
text:
And
              ,
               
              that
               
              hereafter
               
              ages
               
              may
               
              behold

speaker: TALBOT
text:
What
               
              ruin
               
              happened
               
              in
               
              revenge
               
              of
               
              him
              ,

speaker: TALBOT
text:
Within
               
              their
               
              chiefest
               
              temple
               
              I’ll
               
              erect

speaker: TALBOT
text:
A
               
              tomb
               
              wherein
               
              his
               
              corpse
               
              shall
               
              be
               
              interred
              ,

speaker: TALBOT
text:
Upon
               
              the
               
              which
              ,
               
              that
               
              everyone
               
              may
               
              read
              ,

speaker: TALBOT
text:
Shall
               
              be
               
              engraved
               
              the
               
              sack
               
              of
               
              Orleance
              ,

speaker: TALBOT
text:
The
               
              treacherous
               
              manner
               
              of
               
              his
               
              mournful
               
              death
              ,

speaker: TALBOT
text:
And
               
              what
               
              a
               
              terror
               
              he
               
              had
               
              been
               
              to
               
              France
              .

speaker: TALBOT
text:
But
              ,
               
              lords
              ,
               
              in
               
              all
               
              our
               
              bloody
               
              massacre
              ,

speaker: TALBOT
text:
I
               
              muse
               
              we
               
              met
               
              not
               
              with
               
              the
               
              Dauphin’s
               
              grace
              ,

speaker: TALBOT
text:
His
               
              new-come
               
              champion
              ,
               
              virtuous
               
              Joan
               
              of
               
              Arc
              ,

speaker: TALBOT
text:
Nor
               
              any
               
              of
               
              his
               
              false
               
              confederates
              .

speaker: BEDFORD
text:
’Tis
               
              thought
              ,
               
              Lord
               
              Talbot
              ,
               
              when
               
              the
               
              fight
               
              began
              ,

speaker: BEDFORD
text:
Roused
               
              on
               
              the
               
              sudden
               
              from
               
              their
               
              drowsy
               
              beds
              ,

speaker: BEDFORD
text:
They
               
              did
               
              amongst
               
              the
               
              troops
               
              of
               
              armèd
               
              men

speaker: BEDFORD
text:
Leap
               
              o’er
               
              the
               
              walls
               
              for
               
              refuge
               
              in
               
              the
               
              field
              .

speaker: BURGUNDY
text:
Myself
              ,
               
              as
               
              far
               
              as
               
              I
               
              could
               
              well
               
              discern

speaker: BURGUNDY
text:
For
               
              smoke
               
              and
               
              dusky
               
              vapors
               
              of
               
              the
               
              night
              ,

speaker: BURGUNDY
text:
Am
               
              sure
               
              I
               
              scared
               
              the
               
              Dauphin
               
              and
               
              his
               
              trull
              ,

speaker: BURGUNDY
text:
When
               
              arm-in-arm
               
              they
               
              both
               
              came
               
              swiftly
               
              running
              ,

speaker: BURGUNDY
text:
Like
               
              to
               
              a
               
              pair
               
              of
               
              loving
               
              turtledoves

speaker: BURGUNDY
text:
That
               
              could
               
              not
               
              live
               
              asunder
               
              day
               
              or
               
              night
              .

speaker: BURGUNDY
text:
After
               
              that
               
              things
               
              are
               
              set
               
              in
               
              order
               
              here
              ,

speaker: BURGUNDY
text:
We’ll
               
              follow
               
              them
               
              with
               
              all
               
              the
               
              power
               
              we
               
              have
              .

speaker: MESSENGER
text:
All
               
              hail
              ,
               
              my
               
              lords
              .
               
              Which
               
              of
               
              this
               
              princely
               
              train

speaker: MESSENGER
text:
Call
               
              you
               
              the
               
              warlike
               
              Talbot
              ,
               
              for
               
              his
               
              acts

speaker: MESSENGER
text:
So
               
              much
               
              applauded
               
              through
               
              the
               
              realm
               
              of
               
              France
              ?

speaker: TALBOT
text:
Here
               
              is
               
              the
               
              Talbot
              .
               
              Who
               
              would
               
              speak
               
              with
               
              him
              ?

speaker: MESSENGER
text:
The
               
              virtuous
               
              lady
              ,
               
              Countess
               
              of
               
              Auvergne
              ,

speaker: MESSENGER
text:
With
               
              modesty
               
              admiring
               
              thy
               
              renown
              ,

speaker: MESSENGER
text:
By
               
              me
               
              entreats
              ,
               
              great
               
              lord
              ,
               
              thou
               
              wouldst
               
              vouchsafe

speaker: MESSENGER
text:
To
               
              visit
               
              her
               
              poor
               
              castle
               
              where
               
              she
               
              lies
              ,

speaker: MESSENGER
text:
That
               
              she
               
              may
               
              boast
               
              she
               
              hath
               
              beheld
               
              the
               
              man

speaker: MESSENGER
text:
Whose
               
              glory
               
              fills
               
              the
               
              world
               
              with
               
              loud
               
              report
              .

speaker: BURGUNDY
text:
Is
               
              it
               
              even
               
              so
              ?
               
              Nay
              ,
               
              then
              ,
               
              I
               
              see
               
              our
               
              wars

speaker: BURGUNDY
text:
Will
               
              turn
               
              unto
               
              a
               
              peaceful
               
              comic
               
              sport
              ,

speaker: BURGUNDY
text:
When
               
              ladies
               
              crave
               
              to
               
              be
               
              encountered
               
              with
              .

speaker: BURGUNDY
text:
You
               
              may
               
              not
              ,
               
              my
               
              lord
              ,
               
              despise
               
              her
               
              gentle
               
              suit
              .

speaker: TALBOT
text:
Ne’er
               
              trust
               
              me
              ,
               
              then
              ;
               
              for
               
              when
               
              a
               
              world
               
              of
               
              men

speaker: TALBOT
text:
Could
               
              not
               
              prevail
               
              with
               
              all
               
              their
               
              oratory
              ,

speaker: TALBOT
text:
Yet
               
              hath
               
              a
               
              woman’s
               
              kindness
               
              overruled
              .
              —

speaker: TALBOT
text:
And
               
              therefore
               
              tell
               
              her
               
              I
               
              return
               
              great
               
              thanks
              ,

speaker: TALBOT
text:
And
               
              in
               
              submission
               
              will
               
              attend
               
              on
               
              her
              .
              —

speaker: TALBOT
text:
Will
               
              not
               
              your
               
              Honors
               
              bear
               
              me
               
              company
              ?

speaker: BEDFORD
text:
No
              ,
               
              truly
              ,
               
              ’tis
               
              more
               
              than
               
              manners
               
              will
              ;

speaker: BEDFORD
text:
And
               
              I
               
              have
               
              heard
               
              it
               
              said
               
              unbidden
               
              guests

speaker: BEDFORD
text:
Are
               
              often
               
              welcomest
               
              when
               
              they
               
              are
               
              gone
              .

speaker: TALBOT
text:
Well
               
              then
              ,
               
              alone
              ,
               
              since
               
              there’s
               
              no
               
              remedy
              ,

speaker: TALBOT
text:
I
               
              mean

              courtesy
              .
              —

speaker: TALBOT
text:
Come

              ,

              .

text:
You

              ?
